00025 #include "OgreDynLib.h"
00026 
00027 #include "OgreException.h"
00028 #include "OgreLogManager.h"
00029 
00030 namespace Ogre {
00031 
00032     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00033     DynLib::DynLib( const String& name )
00034     {
00035         OgreGuard("DynLib::DynLib");
00036 
00037         mName = name;
00038         mIsLoaded = false;
00039         m_hInst = NULL;
00040 
00041         OgreUnguard();
00042     }
00043 
00044     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00045     DynLib::~DynLib()
00046     {
00047         if( mIsLoaded )
00048             unload();
00049     }
00050 
00051     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00052     void DynLib::load()
00053     {
00054         OgreGuard("DynLib::load");
00055 
00056         // Log library load
00057         LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("Loading library " + mName);
00058 
00059         m_hInst = (DYNLIB_HANDLE)DYNLIB_LOAD( mName.c_str() );
00060 
00061         if( !m_hInst )
00062             Except(
00063                 Exception::ERR_INTERNAL_ERROR, 
00064                 "Could not load dynamic library " + mName,
00065                 "DynLib::load" );
00066 
00067         mIsLoaded = true;
00068 
00069         OgreUnguard();
00070     }
00071 
00072     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00073     void DynLib::unload()
00074     {
00075         OgreGuard("DynLib::unload");
00076 
00077         // Log library unload
00078         if (mIsLoaded)
00079         {
00080             LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("Unloading library " + mName);
00081 
00082             if( DYNLIB_UNLOAD( m_hInst ) )
00083                 Except(
00084                     Exception::ERR_INTERNAL_ERROR, 
00085                     "Could not unload dynamic library " + mName,
00086                     "DynLib::unload");
00087         }
00088         mIsLoaded = false;
00089 
00090         OgreUnguard();
00091     }
00092 
00093     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00094     void* DynLib::getSymbol( const String& strName ) const throw()
00095     {
00096         return DYNLIB_GETSYM( m_hInst, strName.c_str() );
00097     }
00098 }
